content: learn how to crochet the beautifully simple trinity stitch this stitch s charm lies in its versatility perfect for creating baby blankets warm wearables and even durable washcloths with no holes or gaps join our washcloth of the month club and discover a 3 new crochet patterns each month the pattern includes full written instructions for the dishcloth a trinity stitch tutorial and video will be added soon this pattern will be available as a free pdf download until january 15 2024 at 11 59 pm et for cal participants simply add the pattern to your cart before 11 59 pm est on january 15th and it will show as $0 00 the free pattern will be available on my blog beginning on january 14 2024 at 10 00 pm est > this pattern is available for free on > my blog which is monetized by ads if > you prefer an ad-free version of the > pattern it is available to purchase > right here on ravelry ♥ rhondda instagram https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ instagram reels https //www instagram com/oombawkadesigncrochet/reels/ tiktok https //www tiktok com/@oombawkadesigncrochet pinterest https //www pinterest com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ youtube https //www youtube com/oombawkadesigncrochet facebook https //www facebook com/oombawkadesigncrochet/ newsletter https //oombawkadesigncrochet com/crochet-newsletter © 2012-2024 designed by rhondda mol oombawka design crochet all rights reserved you may sell finished items you crochet from this pattern no part of this publication may be reproduced altered or distributed in any form or by any means without express written permission from rhondda mol
